home.looking: I am looking for a job!
home.introduction: I am a full-stack web developer, web designer, game designer, and last but not least, a PC building enthusiast. I live in Northern Italy, but I would love to explore the world.
home.cta_projects: Take a look at my projects
home.cta_section_title: Ready to bring your ideas to life!
home.cta_section_description: Whether you need a stunning website, an engaging game, or a custom-built PC, I'm here to help. Let's discuss your project and create something amazing together.

description.part_1: When I was still a child, my father brought home one of the first iMacs, and I was immediately curious.
description.part_2: While learning to install games and software, I taught myself English as most resources were in English. Meanwhile, I became the go-to person when people's devices didn’t work.
description.part_3: This passion led me to pursue IT studies at one of the few specialized high schools in this field in my area.
description.part_4: During my last year of school, I started building websites, and later I enrolled in a Game Design course where I gained the skills to bring my game ideas to life.

1.edu_description: Study of this branch of game development, including Gameplay design, UI/UX, Level design, and storytelling basics

2.edu_description: Study of networks, basic web stack, C, Java, Assembly 8086, PHP, and MySQL, along with some visual scripting basics

description.part_1: Since I started building websites at school, I haven’t stopped.
description.part_2: After earning my Game Design certificate, I enhanced my knowledge of key game engines like Unity, Unreal, and I’m currently using Godot.
description.part_3: One of my flaws is that I work a bit slowly, although this usually results in higher quality work and ultimately greater satisfaction from my clients and team members.
description.part_4: I also design and build custom PCs, having successfully assembled over 10 for myself, friends, and clients.

1.work_description: Frontend and backend programming and design of websites using ReactJS, ExpressJS, and MySQL.
